title: Looking For ONE Silver Mid or Support for Clash Team
body:
We are looking for one player to go mid or support

Feel Free to add Me or "Risky Au" to join.

replies.body: I main support, add me if you need too.
Yeah I main mid, add me Harmiiiii

I can be a support if you'd like, add me if you still have room for me :3 

- AlphaKitsun3 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
